about_the_game:
The Last Warlord: Art Upgrade Pack Instructions

A brand-new art style will be introduced in this Art Upgrade Pack DLC, which will be rolled out in three phases:

1. The first phase will update the portraits and illustrations of 120 generals, along with support for zooming in on illustrations.
2. Brand-new main city scenes for levels 1-4, city seasonal changes (excluding autumn, which will be updated in the next phase), and changes to the overall map.
3. Players will have the option to enable or disable individual scene resources within the game. (When players are in the main city and world map interface, they will need to return to the main menu and reload the game for changes to take effect.)
4. Subsequent updates will include additional general portraits and illustrations, new battlefield maps, and troop models.

Instructions:
After installation, click the Art Upgrade Pack DLC in the force selection interface to start the game.

The Last Warlord: Art Upgrade Pack Instructions

A brand-new art style will be introduced in this Art Upgrade Pack DLC, which will be rolled out in three phases:

3. Players will have the option to enable or disable individual scene resources within the game. (When players are in the main city and world map interface, they will need to return to the main menu and reload the game for changes to take effect.)
4. Subsequent updates will include additional general portraits and illustrations, new battlefield maps, and troop models.

Instructions:

short_description: The Last Warlord will take a comprehensive art upgrade. The art upgrade DLC includes character portraits, main city scenes, world maps, battlefield maps, character models, and more.
